attributes.action: Scrap immediatly all motor vehicles found being driven untaxed or uninsured on our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That drivers caught driving a Motor Vehicle that is neither taxed or insured have their vehicle taken away and scrapped immediately. We learn that there are some million motor vehicles being driven around whilst their owner clearly flout the law. I’m sure if we targeted these people more closely it would help to ease our traffic congestion too.
Please Mr Blair – I would like to see more on the spot checks carried out and removal of these vehicles from our roads for good if they are found not to have the appropriate documentation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
